item.description:
OK, this isn't hiking but the nights are still long and what better way to fill the night this winter but with some good clean old fashioned dancing!!!

There will be Contra Dancing from 8 PM to as late as 11 PM at the American Legion Post in Wethersfield, CT (on 2nd Saturdays). This venue is not as rustic as the Powder Mill Barn on 4th Sundays but I'll give it a try. Beginner's lessons from 7:30 PM to 8 PM. All are welcome to come to the event (married or single). You don't have to bring a partner. Children are welcome too. Casual dress (best no high heels, though). This venue is non-alcoholic. There is an $12 fee ($5 for students, 12 and under free) the Post charges for entry to cover their costs.

Please note there is an overall limit as to how many people can fit in the Post so I have limited RSVP's. Parking is on the street. Just because you RSVP here does not necessarily mean there will be room in the Post if you arrive late.

 


Location/directions to approximate meetup location at American Legion Post (275 Main Street, Wethersfield, CT):
http://www.mapquest.c...

American Legion Post in Wethersfield, Contra Dancing information:
1-888-423-0423 (1-888-HCD-0HCD) Ext. 2
http://www.hcdance.or...

Definition of Contra Dancing:
Fun: http://www.sbcds.org/...
Dry: http://en.wikipedia.o...

Nice video clip of some Contra Dancing (at the Post)
http://www.youtube.co...

Contra Dance Etiquette
http://www.tcdancers....

Basic Contra Dance steps defined
http://www.twodogwalt...
http://www.tcdancers....
http://www.tftm.org/c...

 


=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
